positive_examples: This is an example of legal doctrine.
The legal doctrine demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed legal doctrine in this context.
A typical case of legal doctrine would involve these features.
The concept of legal doctrine applies here.
Established principles of law that guide judicial decisions and legal interpretation.
negative_examples: This is an example of multinational doctrine, not legal doctrine.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: MultinationalDoctrine, or other types of Doctrine

definition: A principle or rule established through judicial decisions guiding legal interpretation.
